high_descs: Turn left and walk a step then turn right and walk to the table in front of you.
Pick up the soap dispenser to the left of another soap dispenser.
Turn right and walk so you are facing the toilet with the toilet between you and the wall with the toilet paper dispenser.
Place the soap dispenser on the back of toilet to the left of the yellow spray bottle.
anns.task_desc: Place a soap dispenser on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn left towards the door and then turn right towards the dresser.
Pick up the left bottle on the dresser.
Turn right towards the bath tub and turn right towards the toilet.
Place the bottle next to the yellow cleaner on the toilet water tank.
anns.task_desc: Place the lotion bottle from the dresser on top of toilet water tank.

high_descs: walk up to the front of the dresser
pick up the bottle of lotion from the dresser
walk the bottle over to the toilet
place the bottle on top of the toilet tank
anns.task_desc: take the bottle of lotion on the dresser to set on top of the toilet tank

high_descs: Move left facing the left side of the counter top where the lotion bottles are
Pick up the bottle closest to the left on top of the counter
Carry the bottle over to the toilet tank
Place the bottle on top of the toilet tank to the left of the yellow spray bottle
anns.task_desc: Move a lotion bottle to the back of the toilet

high_descs: Turn left and walk over to the wall, then turn right and walk up to the dresser.
Pick up the leftmost bottle of lotion off of the dresser.
Turn left and walk towards the tub, then hang a right and walk up to the toilet.
Put the bottle of lotion on top of the toilet tank.
anns.task_desc: Move a bottle of lotion to the toilet tank.

high_descs: Walk forward to the bathroom counter
Pick up the left most pump bottle from the counter
Turn around and walk to the toilet
Set the bottle down on top of the back of the toilet
anns.task_desc: Put the pump bottle on the toilet
